attributes.action: Ban the use and sale of fireworks to the public
attributes.additional_details: They cause unnecessary stress and trauma on pets and livestock. They cause pollution and litter and can be considered dangerous in the wrong hands. This is an unregulated product where anyone over the age of 18 can purchase them. If used incorrectly they can start fires and bring danger to the lives of others, which in turn puts further strain on the NHS and fire services. They are not essential in this country and cause a lot of people unnecessary stress each year.
attributes.background: Stop shops from selling fireworks to the public. Only allow organised events/companies/councils to use them at key events such as new year and Bonfire night.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
